title: Hello, there
name: Mustofa Amami
hero-description: Passionate about creating beautiful, functional web experiences with modern technologies. Based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I love creating beautiful, functional, and user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems. With a strong background in React, Next.js, and TypeScript, I bring ideas to life through clean, efficient code.
about.learning: Continuously learning and staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices.

what-i-do.title: What I Do
what-i-do.content: I specialize in building modern web applications using cutting-edge technologies like React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. I focus on creating responsive, accessible, and performant user interfaces that provide exceptional user experiences across all devices.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.content: What my clients say about working with me.
testimonials.trusted: Trusted by clients and colleagues for delivering high-quality work and exceptional results.
testimonials.quote1: Mustofa is an exceptional developer who consistently delivers high-quality work. His attention to detail and problem-solving skills are outstanding.
testimonials.quote2: Working with Mustofa was a pleasure. He's professional, reliable, and his technical expertise helped bring our vision to life.

clients.title: Clients
clients.content: Companies I've had the pleasure to work with.

cta.title: Ready to work together?
cta.description: Let's create something amazing together! I'm always excited to take on new challenges and bring innovative ideas to life.
